result.execSummary:
The defendant Jeremy Michael Slama was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Battery [Modifiers: Penalties for Misdemeanors-Class "A"], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 940.19(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
Apply bond on file.
DNA surcharge.
Defendant to submit a DNA sample.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Jeremy Michael Slama

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: to State's Limine filed by Atty John Kucinski. eif

TO ALSO INCLUDE 15CM600 and 15CM601:
CO: RMW, REP: Drost, CLERK: Liddle. ADA:  Alexis S. Mckinley   DF ATTY:  John A. Kucinski   DF:  Jeremy Michael Slama appeared. Case called at 4:17 p.m. Court notes this is the date and time set for a final pre trial. Atty Kucinski states there is an agreement and recites agreement. ADA McKinley in agreement. Has complied with Victims Rights. Court reads charge and maximum penalty. DE pleads NO CONTEST to amended Ct 1 Battery without enhancer  in 15CM600 . DE sworn. Crt reviews plea questionnaire and informs DE of rights. Crt finds DE freely, voluntarily and knowingly waives rights and makes plea. Attorney's stipulate to the facts. Crt accepts plea, finds factual basis and finds DE guilty of amended Ct 1 Battery without enhancer in 15CM600. On motion of the State without objecton, Crt dismisses 15CM601. Sentencing arguments. 

Crt orders:

- Fine in amount of $7.00 and DNA Surcharge of $200.00. Total fine amount of $500.00. Bond to apply

- DNA Sample

Includes 15CM600 and 15CM601


  It is hereby ordered, as a condition of the defendant's bond/bail in the above-captioned case, that he/she have absolutely NO ABUSIVE CONTACT whatsoever with the complaining witness, or with any of the following named persons and/or locations,Brandi S.  The term "abusive contact" is hereby defined as a verbal assault or an intentional infliction of or threat to inflict physical pain, physical injury or illness, an impairment of physical condition, and /or sexual contact or sexual intercourse without consent.  The aforementioned condition of bond/bail is set pursuant to Sec. 969.02(3)(d), Wis Stats.

Further, it is ordered that if the defendant fails to comply with the conditions of his/her bond/bail that he/she may be charged with the offense of bailjumping contrary to Sec. 946.49(1)(a), Wis Stats.
Further, it is ORDERED that if the defendant fails to comply with the conditions of his/her bond/bail that he/she may be charged with the offense of bailjumping contrary to Sec. 946.49(1)(a), Wis. Stats.

Pre-trial conference at 11-18-2015 08:30 am

Includes 15CM600 and 15CM601


It is hereby ordered, as a condition of the defendant's bond/bail in the above-captioned case, that he/she have absolutely NO CONTACT whatsoever with the complaining witness, or with any of the following named persons and/or locations,  Brandi S. or her residence.  The term "no contact" is hereby defined as no contact in person, by telephone, by way of electronic device, email, facsimile, social media including but not limited to texting, Facebook, Twitter, contact through the mail, and/or through a third person.  The aforementioned condition of bond/bail is set pursuant to Sec. 969.02(3)(d), Wis Stats.

Further, it is ORDERED that if the defendant fails to comply with the conditions of his/her bond/bail that he/she may be charged with the offense of bailjumping contrary to Sec. 946.49(1)(a), Wis. Stats.

CO: RMW, RPR: Erin Drost, CLERK: E. Ferrill, ADA:   Megan E. Kelly and Edward Minser,   DF ATTY:  John A. Kucinski,  DF:  Jeremy Michael Slama appeared from jail.   Includes 15CM600 & 15CM601. Court confirms address.   Court informs def of charges, possible penalties and rights. Def understands.  Waives reading.  NG.  Waives speedy trial. State is requesting $500.00 CB and NC with Victim, Atty Kucinski argues.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for November 18, 2015 at 08:30 am.
